note: Archaeologist/Pot-monkey. Freelance post-Roman pottery analyst specialising in central and southern England and East Anglia. Fat old incarnation of the bloke off Time Team. Left-wing and sweary. Likes Belgian beer, Rugby League (COYS!), music, and motorbikes. Hates Tories of every shade. Still finding my way around here but seriously considering quitting The Other Place altogether and leaving it to the fascists and bots.
